Class CameraSpaceIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Map.Iterators.AbstractMapIterator

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<CoreData>

    public class CameraSpaceIterator
extends AbstractMapIterator
    A map iterator which loops only over area covered by the camera
